20 ALKERMES •  CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY REPORT • ENVIRONMENT
*“Recycled”: A waste that is used, reused or reclaimed (based on SASB RT0101).
**“Waste-to-energy”: A method of converting non-recyclable waste into useable forms of energy including heat and electricity.
***No hazardous waste was sent to landfill facilities.
Note: Amounts in the graph above do not sum due to rounding.Alkermes Waste Profile 2020 (Total Enterprise Waste)
